forecast.day_comments: Snow.  High near 31. South wind 3 to 6 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 80%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: A slight chance of snow before 7pm, then a slight chance of snow showers after 1am.  Partly cloudy, with a low around 23. Calm wind becoming southwest around 5 mph after midnight.  Chance of precipitation is 20%.
